conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a united states of america movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.text:
If you're in the mood for a blend of humor and friendship, I'd highly recommend "Ted" (2012). This film tells the story of a man and his talking teddy bear, and it features star performances from Mila Kunis and Seth MacFarlane.

On the other hand, if you're into action-packed spy thrillers, "Tomorrow Never Dies" (1997) with Pierce Brosnan as James Bond could be a great choice for you. This movie involves Bond trying to prevent a media mogul from triggering a war between China and the United Kingdom. Enjoy your movie time!

This film tells an extraordinary tale of real-life events during the Iran hostage crisis, with Ben Affleck playing a CIA agent who rescues six Americans using a Hollywood production as cover. Another interesting choice is "The Bourne Legacy" if you're into action thrillers, featuring Jeremy Renner and Edward Norton in a continuation of the popular Jason Bourne franchise. Enjoy your movie time!
